products.title: Shoes 1
products.description: Shoes are made from materials like leather, synthetic fabric, mesh, or rubber. The upper part provides comfort and support, while the sole (usually rubber or foam) offers grip and cushioning

products.title: Jeans 1
products.description: Jeans made from denim, a strong cotton fabric often blended with a small amount of elastane or polyester for stretch and comfort. They are durable, breathable, and designed for everyday wear, with sturdy stitching and a comfortable fit.

products.title: T-Shirt 1
products.description: T-shirts are made from cotton, polyester, or a blend of both. Cotton makes them soft and breathable, while polyester adds strength and helps them keep their shape. They are lightweight, comfortable, and suitable for everyday wear.
